Trade/Device Name(s): STA-R Evolution® Expert Series Hemostasis System
Regulation Name(s): System, multipurpose for in vitro coagulation studies
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): STA-R Evolution® Expert Series Hemostasis System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for modified STA-R Evolution Expert Series Hemostasis System, an automated clinical analyzer for coagulation testing
Indications for Use Summary: Fully automatic clinical instrument for tests on human plasma to aid diagnosis of coagulation abnormalities or monitor anticoagulant therapy
